snippet: Second seed Andy Murray has always said he would quite like an indoor grand slam event and at the U.S. Open it seems he has found the next best thing....
lead_paragraph: Second seed Andy Murray has always said he would quite like an indoor grand slam event and at the U.S. Open it seems he has found the next best thing.

headline.print_headline: Murray Flourishes in New Conditions at U.S. Open
headline.main: Murray Flourishes in New Conditions at U.S. Open
